name: fuel_energy_efficiency_report.engine_state_fuel_by_hour_v3
description: Interval hours for driver-device combinations containing engine state durations and fuel consumed after filtering out fuel consumption that occurs during spotty ECU segments.

metadata.comment: The date of this hour interval.
The device id of this hour of data.
The driver who was assigned to this vehicle during this hour of data.
The starting timestamp of this hourly interval.
The ending timestamp of this hourly interval.
The duration in milliseconds that this vehicle's engine was ON during this hour.
The duration in milliseconds that this vehicle's engine was IDLE during this hour.

The duration in milliseconds that productive auxiliary power was being used during engine IDLE time. Productive auxiliary power can be used for PTO (power take-off), a plow, a sweeper, a salter, a door, a boom, or an engine.
The amount of fuel consumed in milliliters during this hour.
The amount of gaseous fuel consumed in grams during this hour.
